website_summaries.verdict: Built for comfort, durability, and performance, these high-quality paddles impress all-around.
pros: Ultra-lightweight blade is reinforced with glass for supreme durability
Handle is made of fiberglass for a weightless feel
cons: A few customers expected it to be lighter than was advertised from the manufacturer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed in this paddle. the first time it was brought out to use, it cracked!
customer_reviews.author: angela proctor

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy, too wide a shaft
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike this paddle. Im female, 5'3' and have hands on the smaller side, so perhaps this is why it feels so heavy and wrong when I use it, even paddling on a calm day. I paddle lakes mostly, and I find the different shape of the blades makes my 106 kayak track awkwardly, plus just holding it hurts my hands. My husband and son are OK with it, but I do NOt recommend it for a woman. It is also extremely difficult to push in the button to break down the paddle.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: I don"t think I could have gotten a better paddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: I waited a year or more to be sure. I don"t think I could have gotten a better paddle for the price. Great quality materials and craftsmanship.Comfortable to use from a sit in kayak.
customer_reviews.author: 10minus0

customer_reviews.title: I really like how stiff the fiberglass shaft is and hoping it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this after breaking my Carlisle Magic paddle with aluminum shaft after taking on some serious whitewater. After 3 years, i was paddling too hard and it kinked, then failed on my, so this is my replacement. I have also ordered the carbon fiber shafted ocean kayak paddle on amazon, but i've found that its really hard for me to beat this Carlisle paddle design. It has the bite i need to manuver in rapids. I really like how stiff the fiberglass shaft is and hoping it will last me longer than the aluminum shafted paddle.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Tucker

customer_reviews.title: As good as  more expensive paddles.
customer_reviews.text: Used this paddle for the first time on a 7 mile trip on the lake. It works just a good as my $200 paddle. I saw no noticeable difference. The dihedral blade gives more power to your stoke.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Probably worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice paddle that is easy to use and way more efficient than the cheap sporting goods store brand paddle that it replaced. Light and stiff that definitely adds power to your stroke!
customer_reviews.author: Huddy

customer_reviews.title: Don't forget you need one of these if you buy a kayak!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my kayak not reading that it didn't come with a paddle luckily I found this out before my big trip was able to make this purchase. This paddle works great is adjustable and pretty and color as well.
customer_reviews.author: jns70

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this from the cheap aluminum paddle that came with my kayak. The weight is nice, and after our first couple trips, I'm satisfied that it handles well. Happy with the purchase. Mines assembles and disassembles easily. One of my yak grips slips a bit, but friction tape on the handle should fix that minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of paddles. We love using them out on the pond and lake. Highly recommend this brand and seller. Came as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: NEN

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I will try it and see if it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised: EXCEPT I chose 230 cm and received 220cm length. Very disappointed. I will try it and see if it works for my setup, if not I will be returning the product and contacting to see if they actually have a 230cm or just lie and say they do.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to kayaking and, to be honest, purchased this paddle as it matches my "mango" kayak. I've owned one other paddle and the Carlisle isn't quit as light, but it's not overly heavy and fine for the rivers and lakes I kayak in Minnesota. A great starter paddle at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: S. Whitten

customer_reviews.title: great paddle that makes river trips more enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: great paddle that makes river trips more enjoyable. love the oval hand-placement section on the right side of the paddle. makes a great reference for proper hand placement. be sure you buy a paddle that is the right length for you and your boat. makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: Great light paddle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she really likes the paddle. It is very light and appears to be well made. One of the best paddles out there.
customer_reviews.author: uferreal42

customer_reviews.title: Durable lightweight cool design
customer_reviews.text: First pair arrivved damaged in peices, but amazon wa s great and overnighted the replacements. Im a Avid sea kayaker and these babies go go go. They've survived me and my excursions so that definitely speaks to its durability
customer_reviews.author: reed

customer_reviews.title: Has a good weight. The joint in the middle does turn ...
customer_reviews.text: First kayak paddle so not that experienced. Has a good weight. The joint in the middle does turn a little when your paddling. I don’t know if that’s avoidable on a more expensive one but it would be nice. Good grip and strong blades.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: OK for beginners or short distances
customer_reviews.text: It's a very average paddle. If you are just starting kayaking then it will be a good economical way to see if you like it. If you already paddle a lot you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: 97wrangler

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for a day trip.
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy, I wouldn't want to have to paddle very far with it, as stated one side of the handle is much thicker not a deal breaker for me but not stoked either. Overall I'm not very satisfied,
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Mismatched shafts, one oval, one round. Rough fiberglass edges. Much heavier than specified.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As promised,  5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Great product ,light, strong. i'm 6.3 and sit on top of my yeti cooler on my paddleboard, so I wish it would've been a little longer. But works as it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nohl

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it is at least a pound more than my ...
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is much heavier than the advertised weight. Feels like it is at least a pound more than my Bending Branches Sunrise paddle. Exhausting to paddle with - used it once, and now it stands in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: KLC in St Augustine

customer_reviews.title: a good value
customer_reviews.text: This a good, competent paddle. I think it such a good value (especially at sale price) that I now have two of them. It is fairly light weight, but is strong and has a good balance and feel to it, and I think it will be durable. Realizing that it is not a high-end paddle rates it four stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Edward

customer_reviews.title: BROKE
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" and 140 lb. I only used this paddle once and it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I love this paddle you can adjusted to multiple different lengths it is super lightweight and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great paddle! Nice and light with a fiberglass shaft. Good and stiff for paddling on lakes and rivers. Definitely an upgrade from my original plastic/aluminum paddle.
customer_reviews.author: keno

customer_reviews.title: Magic Plus Paddle excellent for me
customer_reviews.text: Paddle is stronger, sturdy and more durable than I had hoped for. I have been in some real rough surf and found myself safe and pleased to have this paddle with me.What more could you want? And besides this magic plus paddle is such an excellent price. I would recommend this paddle to friends also.
customer_reviews.author: LisaPeaceA

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I like this paddle very much. It propels the kayak along well and is light enough and has enough flex to make it comfortable for longer days on the lake. The price makes this a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ricoh KY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome paddle for the price! Will be buying another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: SingleBill

customer_reviews.title: 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. She loves it. Lightweight and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light paddle, without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light. Helps my kayak track straight, smooth paddling. My daughter likes how they match our boat.
customer_reviews.author: BC T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for low angle paddlers
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and powerful, I just needed to order the next size up since my kayak has a wide cockpit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Saurers

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to separate pieces
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to take apart. Got stuck on the water unable to separate pieces to pick it up out of the way. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: B. Comeaux

customer_reviews.title: For the price I think I did very good. Took a gamble when I bought them
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight compared to the ones I have seen before. For the price I think I did very good. Took a gamble when I bought them, but it paid off. Enjoying them, so far Im thinking about keeping them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: sergio de los rios

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: So, this paddle is cheap, sturdy, and has great performance! I am a recreational/fishing kayaker and can tell you that this paddle propels me through the water without any great effort. Its relatively light and has a very comfortable feel to it. The only thing that I may complain about is that the gripping on the paddle is lacking but nothing that sports tape can't fix. All in all I highly recommend this paddle!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Works great and not too
customer_reviews.text: Its a solid paddle. Works great and not too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Zac Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: look well made and nice and light but haven't been able to try due to winter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paddle fits together nicely and feels solid when in use
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and shipped on time. Paddle fits together nicely and feels solid when in use. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jarl

customer_reviews.title: Do better woth aluminum that came with kayak
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I expected. Do better woth aluminum that came with kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of paddles...So much better than aluminum!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Price is comparable to an aluminum paddle..but SO much better.
customer_reviews.author: rjlcpa

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised... this is my second ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly as advertised ... this is my second paddle of this type.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is great! Lightweight and color matches my kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this paddle to duck class 3/4 rivers. It has held up well
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alan Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Good Paddle
customer_reviews.text: I used it once so far but it was great. I was out for about 5 hours and by the end of the day my arms were less tired than they had been with a previous paddle. I am a beginner kayaker and having the right paddle makes a great difference.
customer_reviews.author: VG R.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson on his birthday. He loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Roach

customer_reviews.title: Carlisle paddle
customer_reviews.text: This paddle is wonderful, I used the same one in the past and replaced it only because the old one was stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Moore

customer_reviews.title: Carlisle Magic Plus - Blue
customer_reviews.text: have another set of Carlisle Paddles I think these are the new model ... took them on overnight kayak trip up river then down to Goldsboro + back and forth several times to cabin on the river ...
customer_reviews.author: Off Course One

customer_reviews.title: Awesome paddle. I'm 6' 4'' and now that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome paddle. I'm 6' 4'' and now that I switched to a longer paddle my back hurts alot less on kayaking trips. This paddle is also very effective, it moves through water with great ease. I really wish I would've bought this years ago. You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: gary

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles
customer_reviews.text: These are great fiberglass paddles. They are light weight and sturdy. I would recommend them to anyone. We have used them on a class 2 river and they worked great and still look like new. We bought aluminum paddles for about the same price from a big chain sporting goods store that were not as good as these.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rozanske

customer_reviews.title: very nice paddle for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this paddle fairy fast after I order it. It feels much better than my aluminum one and for the price it is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Phot

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I lost my other paddle and had to buy another one. This is decent quality and is serving me well.
customer_reviews.author: Oldmutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent paddle; I would recommend to anyone needing a new one.
customer_reviews.author: KLee

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle
customer_reviews.text: I am a occasional kayaker. Just for fun when it is too rough in the Gulf. I have 2 of these paddles and they are perfect for an afternoon in the mangroves.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P Biedenbach

customer_reviews.title: My wife enjoys using the paddle.
customer_reviews.text: Good paddle good buy when weighted with the sale price. Would liked it have lighter paddle but with cost in the equation this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: scoutpaddle

customer_reviews.title: Paddles as described nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Paddles as described nice and lightweight. Haven't tried them yet as have just received them but are looking forward to using them when the weather permits.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loose piece inside
customer_reviews.text: Came with a loose piece inside the right hand shaft. I cannot get to the piece and it slides from one end to the other loosely. Very annoying!
customer_reviews.author: bclausen

product_meta.title: Carlisle Magic Plus Kayak Paddle - Polypro Blades/Fiberglass Shaft
product_meta.description: Efficient and powerful, the Carlisle Magic Plus kayak paddle is an ideal choice for touring or recreational use. Carlisle's asymmetrical, slightly spooned blade shape combines with a lightweight, flexible fiberglass shaft to produce smooth yet powerful strokes. The wound fiberglass shaft provides a sweet compromise between the stiffness needed for a strong paddle stroke and the flex needed to reduce stress on your joints. Carlisle's Magic Plus paddles can take all of the punishment you dish out while giving you a great day on the water. Measures 240 cm (94.4 inches). Whether you're a beginner or a hardcore paddler, Carlisle has a paddle that's just right for you.
feature_bullets: Carlisle's asymmetrical, slightly spooned blade shape combines with a lightweight, flexible fiberglass shaft to produce smooth yet powerful strokes.
The wound fiberglass shaft provides a sweet compromise between the stiffness needed for a strong paddle stroke and the flex needed to reduce stress on your joints.
Carlisle's Magic Plus paddles can take all of the punishment you dish out while giving you a great day on the water.
Whether you're a beginner or a hardcore paddler, Carlisle has a paddle that's just right for you.
Blade Material: Lightweight & Durable High-Impact Glass-Filled Polypropylene
